LinkShapping Class Reference

Detailed Description

Date:
08-20-2001
Author:
Eric Crahen
Version:
1.0

This tool allows PolyLink figures to be dragged or edited. Left-clicking and dragging allows new points to be inserted into the PolyLink, or existing points to be moved. Right-clicking allows existing points to be deleted. The two end points are immune to these operations.
